model

Interface Model

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Task

    public interface Model
extends Task
    this Interface represents the Model's Layer of the Project's MVP architecture. describes the functuality of every Model type within the Project.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nir Meiri, Tal Kramer
